alert.note: Alert for Southeast Yuma County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 12:03AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS WITH NEW THUNDERSTORM DEVELOPMENT EXPECTED ACROSS YUMA COUNTY THROUGH 130 AM MST... At 1158 PM MST, radar indicated an outflow boundary pushing northwestward through Yuma County. This is resulting in new thunderstorm development with gusty winds, localized heavy rainfall and lightning possible. Winds in excess of 40 mph will be possible. Strong, gusty winds will be capable of producing areas of blowing dust with reduced visibilities. Locations impacted include... Yuma, Somerton, Gadsden, Fortuna Foothills, Wellton, Tacna, Paloma, Kinter, Araby, Blaisdell, Tyson, Dateland, Ligurta, Mohawk, and Roll. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 2 and 78. AZ Route 95 between mile markers 29 and 71. AZ Route 195 between mile markers 5 and 26.
